response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its worth to us and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special opportunity tailored specifically for you, taking into account the value you place on the product. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
